ygData.subject: Re: Evil Eye Bags
ygData.msgSnippet: ... of ... If you are old enough to survive lower guk live side go on down and get one for free hon! Most folks camp the eye for one reason only..the mana
ygData.messageBody:
->At 12:32 PM 9/19/99 -0400, you wrote:
>>From: "Alexis Muhly" <acmuhly@...>
>>
>> This plate is so heavy I'd think I'd benefit greatly from a bag of sewn
>>evil eyes for my loot and weapons.. Can someone give me a rough estimate
of
>>what these run in plat?


If you are old enough to survive lower guk live side go on down and get one
for free hon! Most folks camp the eye for one reason only..the mana stone. I
have seen so many bags go to waste.......announce at the zone your looking
for a bag and most hunters will holler out free bag at such and such Loc. If
you are NOT old enough you might be able to sweet talk an older person on
your server into giving you their bag since they are camping the eye... I
know my group had a teleport bound to the eye location when we camped it for
a mana stone, and we just kept gating in and out passing the bags out to
friends.

Elyana Silvanae
Bardess of the 40th Chorus
Ambasador to the Ridgerunners
Innoruuk Server

Counting the days til wedded bliss!
